name: se add-on for AmigaOS 3.14
description:
Your payment/tip is a contribution for my Amiga projects ;)

This is a ready configured add-on pack for AmigaOS 3.14

It does not contain any files from AmigaOS3.14, you need to have a clean AmigaOS3.14 install before installing this add-on.

iGame(WHDL) does not contain games/Amiga ROMs

040/060 CPU, if to run on other CPU some files might need to be replaced

Works on fs-uae, win-uae, amiberry, real Amiga. On real Amiga before you boot after installing go to devs/monitors and delete uaegfx, then after boot you need to make the desktop nice again 😬

Look at video for details
